recipes.label: Visit the Library
recipes.startdescription: After #PREVIOUSCHARACTERNAME# died, I was called in to the library to ensure that things were in order.
recipes.description: It didn't take long to put things in their proper places. I have been given a small sum of money for my troubles.

recipes.label: A gift from the estate of #PREVIOUSCHARACTERNAME#
recipes.startdescription: On the way out, one of #PREVIOUSCHARACTERNAME#'s estate managers offered to let me take a few volumes from the library. Whatever I desire.
recipes.description: I haven't had a chance to read them yet, but these looked interesting. I also took the liberty of writing down directions to an auction house my patron had utilized.

recipes.label: #PREVIOUSCHARACTERNAME# had some valuable tomes in his library.
recipes.startdescription: What books caught my fancy on the way out?
recipes.description: One of the books contained a note on someone who could become a new patron.

recipes.label: Find a Collaborator
recipes.startdescription: I have a name, a description, a few tantalising details... but there are many who enjoy this type of library in the city.
recipes.description: Perhaps this contact will be willing to assist me.

recipes.label: A Patron
recipes.startdescription: I await an answer to a letter.
recipes.description: The reply to your letter is courteous, if cautious. They are intrigued by how you found their name: intrigued enough to meet you.

recipes.label: Find Oriflamme's
recipes.startdescription: The directions to Oriflamme's auction house are cryptic. When one deals in the kind of books my employer studied, one must be circumspect.
recipes.description: An ill-lit street at an ill-favoured bend in a lesser river. A soft yellow light through a grimy window. Need to write the rest of this.
